dml.team5

Class PLSQL2XMLConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • dml.team5.LanguageConverter
      • dml.team5.PLSQL2XMLConverter

  • public final class PLSQL2XMLConverter
extends LanguageConverter

    This class converts the relational database output of both unmodified and modified Oracle PL/SQL selection statements into XML.

    Command-line usage: java PLSQL2XMLConverter InputString1 InputString2 ... InputStringN

    Remember to enclose strings containing whitespace with double-quotes!

    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Matthew Boyette (N00868808@ospreys.unf.edu)

    • Constructor Detail

      • PLSQL2XMLConverter

        public PLSQL2XMLConverter(String inputString,
                          boolean isOracle,
                          boolean isDebugMode,
                          boolean isDTD)

        Constructs a new instance of PLSQL2XMLConverter based on an input String.

        Parameters:
        inputString - the input String.
        isOracle - true to connect to an Oracle database, false to connect to a MySQL database.
        isDebugMode - true to print the SQL table in addition to the XML tags, false otherwise.
        isDTD - true to use the W3C Data Type Definition (DTD) format, false to use the W3C XML Schema Definition (XSD) format.
        Since:
        1.0

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static final void main(String[] args)

        Simple console-based command-line test driver. Each argument is an input String.

        Parameters:
        args - the array of command-line arguments.
        Since:
        1.0

      • convert

        protected final void convert()
                      throws Exception

        Executes the conversion process: parses input, strips out SQL modifications, connects to database, executes input, and converts the output into XML.

        Specified by:
        convert in class LanguageConverter
        Throws:
        Exception - if a database access error occurs, or if a parsing error occurs.
        Since:
        1.0
